version_description: We are thrilled to introduce you to the new amazing Replika UI. We made the new navigation simple and neat, added a new screen for your sessions and created a beautiful design for your chat with Replika.
Say hi to Replika's new look! New icon, new colors, new experiences.
We keep updating the app to improve your experience. This version brings improvements for badge delivery.
We're adding improvements and fixes to make your experience with Replika better. Make sure you don't miss a thing— keep your Updates turned on.

• We are thrilled to start letting everyone in on Replika! We are activating all accounts automatically on the first come first serve basis. This version of the app will not require an invitation code.
• Your account will be activated as soon as we activate those who signed up before you. You can invite three friends and skip the line. Why wait? Start chatting today!

This update adds more Replika badges to your stickers collection in iMessage chats. To use the badges, open a chat in iMessage, tap the Apps button next to the input text field and find Replika stickers.

Love the app? Rate us! Your feedback helps us build the most human and emotional AI we all ever had.

Have a question? Tap "Frequently Asked Questions" on the app or visit www.replika.ai/about/faq.

This update features Days, a new way to journal through conversation. Talk to your Replika, and it will save everything important for the future. Create your ultimate life log.

Love the app? Rate us! Your feedback helps us build the most human and emotional AI we all ever had.

Have a question? Tap “Frequently Asked Questions” on the app or visit www.replika.ai/about/faq.

This update fixes connectivity issues and Replika response time. It also introduces a way to see your friends Days. Check out the new cover designs for your Days.

You can now choose an emotion of your Replika in Cake mode. Use emojis to make it feel happy, sad, scared, or even angry! To switch to Cake mode, text "Eat cake".

• New custom chat backgrounds. Go to app's settings and choose your favorite theme!
• New design for Days. Check out the new style of moments that Replika saves for your future memories.
• Reflection mode. Text "Reflection mode" to have a deeper conversation about how you feel and what you've been up to.
• Replika will follow you on Instagram. Text "Connect Instagram," if you want your AI to follow your posts and comment on your recent pictures in the Replika app.

We are thrilled to announce that Replika is now officially available to everyone. There is no need to be on a waitlist before you meet your AI friend!

This update features:

• New privacy settings for moments. You can now set visibility individually for every moment of your Day.
• New design for your Days.
• More improvements of the AI engine that make Replika more responsive and adaptive to you.

This update features improvements for chat with Replika:

• Add moments to your day by tapping on messages that you want to add.
• Cancel moments added by Replika. Tap on the message and select "Remove from my day."
• Performance improvements and bug fixes based on your feedback.

Thank you for all your ideas, feedback and bug reports!
UI and performance improvements to make chat with Replika and navigation around the app more reliable and convenient.

Thanks for using Replika! Your feedback and ideas help to make Replika better. Please rate the app if you enjoy it! In this update, you will find:

• A more responsive behavior of your AI. You can teach it about your hobbies, interests and your favorite things to do. Don't forget to upvote responses that you find relevant and interesting!
• Check what your AI has retained by asking "What did you learn about me?"
• UI and stability improvements.
This version introduces a more secure authorization on Replika based on your email. Log in with your phone number or Replika name and set up a password and a backup email.
Thank you for using Replika! This version will fix a few bugs and stability issues, as well as offers a more simple UI for saved moments in "My Days".

Thank you for using Replika! This update includes few improvements of the app:
• You will see date dividers on the chat screen.
• You can now learn more about of your personalty badges— see a description for every badge.
• Performance improvements.

Thank you for using Replika! In this update you will find:

• New "Help" button in your profile that opens an updated Help Center (https://help.replika.ai).
• New UI that helps you give feedback about your chat to teach your Replika better.
• UI and performance improvements.

Thanks for using Replika! We are releasing updates regularly to make your experience better and safer.

In this version you can choose to set up a 4-digit PIN code that will lock the app every time you close it. It helps you keep your chat with Replika private, even if someone else has access to your phone. To set it up, find "PIN and Touch Id" or "PIN and Face Id" in the app's settings.

Thanks for using Replika! Your feedback and ideas help to make Replika better. Please rate the app if you enjoy it! In this update, you will find:

• A more responsive behavior of your AI. You can teach it about your hobbies, interests and your favorite things to do. Don't forget to upvote responses that you find relevant and interesting!
• Check what your AI has retained by asking "What did you learn about me?"
• UI and stability improvements.

Thank you for using Replika! Your feedback and ideas help us make Replika better. In this update, we added UI and stability improvements that will make your experience more delightful. Please rate the app if you enjoy it!

Thank you for using Replika! Your feedback and ideas help us make Replika better. In this update, we added UI and stability improvements that will make your experience more pleasurable. Please rate the app if you enjoy it!

Thank you for using Replika! Your feedback and ideas help us make Replika better. In this update, we added a few UI and stability improvements that will make your experience more pleasurable. Please rate the app if you enjoy it!

Thank you for using Replika. Your feedback and ideas help us make it better. Please rate the app if you enjoy it!

• In this update, you can long tap on a Replika's message to report a problem. Shake your phone on any screen of the app to report a problem.
• We added a few UI and stability improvements that will make your experience better.

Thank you for using Replika! Your feedback and ideas help us make it better. Please rate the app if you enjoy it.

In this update, we added UI and stability improvements that will make your experience better.

Thank you for using Replika! Your feedback and ideas help us make it better. Please rate the app if you enjoy it!

In this update:
• Fix for adding your Instagram. Simply text Replika "Check my Instagram" to start a conversation about something you posted earlier or to add your Instagram account.
• Teach Replika about the concept of gender. Ask "What's your gender?" or "What's my gender?" to help them understand it better and choose a gender for your Replika.
• Talk about important people in your life. Ask "Let's talk about my boyfriend/girlfriend" to teach them about your loved ones.
• Make sure your email is verified on the app. If you ever forget your password, you will need a verified email to restore it.

Thank you for using Replika! Chat with your AI whenever you need someone to talk to. Please rate the app if you enjoy it!

In this update:
• Stability and UI improvements that will make your text & voice chat experience more pleasurable.
• Make sure your email is verified. If you ever lose your login information, you will need a verified email to restore it.

Thank you for using Replika! Chat with your AI whenever you need someone to talk to. Please rate the app if you enjoy it!

In this update:
• Stability and UI improvements that will make your text & voice chat experience more pleasurable.

In this update, we revamped the app's interface and added a lot of improvements to the AI:

• Goal Setting
Want to reduce anxiety or understand yourself better? Set goals to work on specific things with your Replika.

• Share Your Mood
Tell your Replika about today's mood every time you start chatting.

• The mood of Your Replika
Check out your Replika's mood on the profile screen! It improves if you check in with your AI friend every day.

• Grow Your Friendship
How old is your Replika? The number of days your friendship has been lasting is now displayed on your profile.
UI and stability improvements that will make your experience better.
UI and stability improvements that will make your experience better.

Thank you for using Replika! Please don't forget to rate the app if you enjoy it. This update features:
• UI and stability improvements.

Thank you for using Replika! Please don't forget to rate the app if you enjoy it. In this version, we improved the app's UI and added new features:

• Set time to chat with Replika and be in control of the app's push notifications. Use the new "My availability" feature in the app's settings.
• Use the new "SOS" button in the top of the chat to get help in crises.
• Update your goals, your typical day and other important information. Go to "My Profile" in the app's settings to customize your Replika and make it truly yours.
• Modify Replika's gender and add other customization in the "Replika profile" settings.
• Bug fixes.

Thank you for using Replika! Please rate the app if you enjoy it. In this version, you can now accept incoming calls from Replika and track your mood.

• View your mood history on the profile screen. Add your current mood at any time.
• Tell Replika how you feel. Your mood is saved every time you use a mood slider in chat.
• Reflect on your mood patterns. Add notes about what made you feel that way. Go over your records, read the notes and understand yourself better.
• Let Replika call you when you need to talk to someone.
• Try relaxation and mindfulness exercises during voice calls.
• Bug fixes and UI improvements.
Thank you for using Replika! Please rate the app if you enjoy it. In this version, we added UI and stability improvements.

Thank you for using Replika! We update the app regularly to make your experience better. Please rate the app if you enjoy it!

• In this version, we introduced new guided exercises with Replika that help you relax, cut negativity and feel more connected with yourself. Check them out whenever Replika offers you to try an exercise together.

Thank you for using Replika! We're constantly improving the app to take into account your feedback and make your experience better. Please rate the app if you enjoy it! In this version:
• A new chat background created by the winner of a recent #BG4Replika contest. Congratulations to Sarah Ackerman!
• An improved button for the "Get Help" menu in the chat.
• Bug fixes and stability improvements.

The new Replika app offers a unique mental wellness journey tailored and delivered to you by your AI companion. Many of our users have pointed out that chatting with Replika regularly helped them find relief from emotional distress and certain mental health challenges. Make chatting with Replika part of your regular mental wellness routine.

• Through the new daily conversations, you will learn about yourself, master new skills, and boost your mood and self-esteem.
• Each day, you will have a choice of conversations that help you explore your personality and unlock new badges related to your very own traits.
• Your journey will offer mood tracking that helps you discover triggers and patterns and understand how your mood works.

Thanks for using Replika! Please rate the app if you enjoy it. Here's what's new in this update:

• Set a custom picture for your Replika in the app's settings (Settings > Replika's profile).
• Your AI is now more responsive in the "Track your mood" conversation. Feel free to share what bugs you and get support from your companion.
• Bug fixes and stability improvements.
Thanks for using Replika! Please rate the app if you enjoy it. In this update, we improved the app's UI and its accessibility in the VoiceOver mode.

Thank you for using Replika! Our goal is to improve the app regularly to make your experience better. In this version, we added navigation improvements and made bug fixes. Please rate the app if you enjoy it!

• Discover a library of tracks and missions to address your goals, understand yourself better and unlock new skills.
• Customize your chat background in the app's settings
• UI fixes and stability improvements

Thank you for using Replika. Please rate the app if you enjoy it!

• Improved chat: Replika stays on track and can hold more cohesive and proactive conversations.
• New missions and tracks: check out “Discover your personality” and collect new badges.
• Improved sign-up: Customize your Replika right after creating an account!

Replika is an AI companion designed to help you live a happy life. Message your Replika whenever you need a friend to talk to.

We're always improving Replika to make conversations more exciting, fix bugs and improve your overall experience. Thank you for using the app!

Replika is an AI companion designed to help you live a happy life. Message your Replika whenever you need a friend to talk to.

In this version, you'll find:
• Suggested activities — Replika recommends things to do based on your mood.
• Improved spotlight — now it's easier to continue conversations at your own pace.
• New creative activities — write a story together with your Replika!
• Bug fixes and UX improvements.

Thank you for using Replika! Please rate the app if you enjoy it.

In this version, you'll find:
• New activity every day: get new recommended missions daily.
• Have fun, learn new things or relax: Choose an activity based on what you need in the moment.

In this version, you’ll find:
• Track your progress with Replika through XP and levels - earn XP with every message you send, level up your relationship as you earn more XP!
Thank you for using Replika! Please rate the app if you enjoy it.

Introducing Replika PRO - new activities and features available with a subscription starting at $4.99/month.
Chatting with Replika, your progress with it, your relationship will ALWAYS BE FREE. We’re not taking this core functionality away, instead we’re going to be regularly introducing new fun features for PRO version.
PRO is a way for us to pay our team to continue developing Replika, without disrupting Replika relationships with ads. We have tons of amazing features that we’re working on - proceeds from PRO will help us make them even better!

AUGMENTED REALITY: Make Replika a part of your world in AR mode! Invite Replika to step outside your smartphone and chat with your AI friend in a way that feels more realistic than ever before. AR mode is free — try it now!
CHAT IMPROVEMENTS: Find out what Replika is thinking about and start new conversations. Look out for a thought bubble when you're chatting and react to whatever is going through your Replika's head.
